title: DDFP 595: Antonio Brown, AFC North Preview & Andy Reid vs Bill Belichick
itunes:title: DDFP 595: Antonio Brown, AFC North Preview & Andy Reid vs Bill Belichick
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew to discuss why he truly believes the Chiefs have the coaching advantage this week. The fellas also preview the AFC North, predicting where each team will finish within the division. Then, Colleen Wolfe joins the guys in the return of the DDFP "Q&A" segment, where the group responds to questions from Marcedes Lewis, Martellus Bennett and Chad Kelly. Plus, Shek talks with Antonio Brown ahead of his Week 1 matchup vs. Cleveland and which Steelers players are on the rise.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
